title: Human robot interaction
description: Speculative interaction design research about alternative ways to control and interact with robots.

content.title: Research
content.content: For the robotics and sensoring lectorate at the Avans Hogeschool in Breda, I did research to discover how we might interact with robotics in the future. Because the current way of dealing with robots is very dusty and obsolete, I had a very futuristic goal to control a robot with a brain computer interface (BCI).

content.title: Proof of concept
content.content: As a tech interested designer I have always been interested in the human brain. An incidental dream is making possible what seems impossible: controlling objects with your brain. Telekinesis is becoming more and more accessible with the latest technology trends. For example, take a look at NextMind. For my research I created a proof of concept with a couple of smart computer science students and the Ghost Robotics Vision 60 robot dog.
